original_text: Now you have received a new nature. It is God who made it for you so that you can become more and more like him. You will learn to know him better and better.
korean_text: 새 사람을 입었으니 이는 자기를 창조하신 이의 형상을 따라 지식에까지 새롭게 하심을 입은 자니라

sentences.original_text: Now you have received a new nature.
It is God who made it for you
so that you can become more and more like him.
You will learn to know him better and better.
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 그를 점점 더 잘 알게 될 것이다.
